effects: Increase chance of being targeted by 80% for 3 turns
Reduce damage taken from physical attacks taken by 50% to caster for 3 turns
Reduce magic damage[!] taken by 33.33% to caster for 3 turns
Increase DEF, MAG and SPR by 150% for 3 turns to caster
name: Bring It On

來打我呀！

desc_short: Boost MAG, DEF and SPR and temporarily increase chance of being targeted and decrease damage taken for three turns
提高魔力防禦精神的數值+暫時性容易被敵人攻擊+3回合內減少對自身的傷害
3턴 동안 마력, 방어력, 정신력 상승+일시적으로 적의 공격 대상이 될 확률 상승+사용자가 받는 피해 감소
Augmente la MAGIE, la DEF et la PSY et les chances d'être ciblé temporairement, diminue les dégâts reçus pendant 3 tours
Erhöht MAG, ABW und PSY + erhöht kurzfristig Wahrsch., zum Ziel zu werden und verringert drei Runden lange selbst erlittenen Schaden.
Aumenta MAG, DEF y ESP, aumenta la probabilidad de ser atacado temporalmente y reduce el daño recibido durante 3 turnos
